Wheeljack-X::

"Slow down, cowboy - the hardest part's already done." Jackie assures 
him, not noticing Nightlight.  "Just gotta slide this thing into your 
chest compartment ..."  (Forgive me if I overstep my limits here.)  
He pops the aforementioned cavity open and gingerly moves Blackfang's 
spark into place.  Closing Rodimus up, he becomes his normal self 
again.  "There!  Now, take two Asprin and call me in the morning."

and

what
